title: Integrate AWS ECS with Amazon Bedrock
description: Terraform IaC template to deploy AWS ECS Web Application making Amazon Bedrock calls.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern involves utilizing Amazon Bedrock and AWS ECS for deploying a sample web application. The application demonstrates the development and hosting of a GenAI application with minimal code
With this design, users can choose to summarize a PDF document using the LLM from Amazon Bedrock
